SELECT PAY_STATUS SOCIAL_SECURITY_STATE FROM COM_SECUR_PAY_RECORD WHERE REPORT_ID = #{REPORT_ID}

SELECT COUNT(BUSS_NUM) FROM COM_UNCLEAR_CREDIT_TYPE_SUMM WHERE SETTLE_STATUS='1' AND REPORT_ID = #{REPORT_ID}
SELECT NVL(SUM(BUSS_NUM),0) FROM COM_UNCLEAR_CREDIT_TYPE_SUMM WHERE ATTENT_STATUS IN('02','03') AND REPORT_ID = #{REPORT_ID}
SELECT NVL(SUM(BUSS_NUM),0) FROM COM_UNCLEAR_CREDIT_TYPE_SUMM WHERE SETTLE_STATUS='1' AND ATTENT_STATUS IN('02','03') AND REPORT_ID = #{REPORT_ID}

SELECT NVL(SUM(REPLACE(NOR_GUAR_BALANCE,',')),0)+NVL(SUM(REPLACE(ATTEN_GUAR_BALANCE,',')),0)+NVL(SUM(REPLACE(BAD_GUAR_BALANCE,',')),0) NS_GUARANTEE_AMOUNT FROM COM_FORE_GUAR_SUMM WHERE REPORT_ID = #{REPORT_ID}
SELECT NVL(SUM(REPLACE(BUSS_BALANCE,',')),0) NS_BAD_CREDIT_AMOUNT FROM COM_UNCLEAR_CREDIT_TYPE_SUMM WHERE SETTLE_STATUS = '0' AND ATTENT_STATUS = '03' AND REPORT_ID = #{REPORT_ID}
SELECT NVL(SUM(REPLACE(BUSS_SUM,',')),0) BAD_CREDIT_AMOUNT FROM COM_INNER_BUSS_DETAIL WHERE SETTLE_STATUS = '1' AND BUSS_TYPE = '01' AND FIVE_TYPE IN ('次级','可疑','损失') AND REPORT_ID= #{REPORT_ID}
SELECT NVL(SUM(REPLACE(BUSS_BALANCE,',')),0) NS_CREDIT_AMOUNT FROM COM_UNCLEAR_CREDIT_TYPE_SUMM WHERE SETTLE_STATUS = '0' AND REPORT_ID = #{REPORT_ID}

SELECT ((SELECT NVL(SUM(REPLACE(ADVA_PAY_SUM,',')),0) FROM COM_ADVA_PAY_DETAIL WHERE SETTLE_STATUS = '1' AND REPORT_ID = #{REPORT_ID}) + (SELECT NVL(SUM(REPLACE(BUSS_SUM,',')),0) FROM COM_INNER_BUSS_DETAIL WHERE SETTLE_STATUS = '1' AND REPORT_ID = #{REPORT_ID})+ (SELECT NVL(SUM(REPLACE(BUSS_SUM,',')),0) FROM COM_OUTER_BUSS_DETAIL WHERE SETTLE_STATUS = '1' AND REPORT_ID = #{REPORT_ID})) CREDIT_AMOUNT FROM DUAL
SELECT NVL(SUM(REPLACE(BAD_ASSETS_BALANCE,',')),0) OWE_INTEREST_BALANCE FROM COM_BAD_ASSETS_DISP_SUMM WHERE SETTLE_STATUS = '0' AND BAD_ASSETS_TYPE = '02' AND REPORT_ID = #{REPORT_ID}
SELECT NVL(SUM(REPLACE(BUSS_BALANCE,',')),0) LOAN_BALANCE FROM COM_UNCLEAR_CREDIT_TYPE_SUMM WHERE SETTLE_STATUS = '0' AND BUSS_TYPE = '01' AND REPORT_ID = #{REPORT_ID}

SELECT (SELECT NVL(SUM(REPLACE(BUSS_BALANCE,',')),0) FROM COM_OUTER_BUSS_DETAIL WHERE BUSS_TYPE IN ('06','07','08') AND REPORT_ID = #{REPORT_ID})+ (SELECT NVL(SUM(REPLACE(TOTAL,',')),0) FROM COM_BANK_ACC_ATTACGED_INFO WHERE REPORT_ID = #{REPORT_ID}) MIDDLE_TABLEOUT_BALANCE FROM DUAL
SELECT NVL(SUM(REPLACE(BUSS_SUM,',')),0) LOAN_CREDIT_QUOTA FROM COM_INNER_BUSS_DETAIL WHERE BUSS_TYPE = '01' AND REPORT_ID = #{REPORT_ID}
SELECT (SELECT NVL(SUM(REPLACE(BUSS_SUM,',')),0) FROM COM_OUTER_BUSS_DETAIL WHERE BUSS_TYPE IN ('06','07','08') AND REPORT_ID = #{REPORT_ID}) MIDDLE_TABLEOUT_CREDIT_QUOTA FROM DUAL

SELECT COMP_ORG ORG_NAME, LAST_COMP_DATE LAST_COMPENSATION_DATE, TATAL_COMP_SUM AMOUNT, COMP_BALANCE BALANCE, LAST_REPAY_DATE LAST_REPAY_DATE, SETTLE_STATUS STATUS FROM COM_GUAR_COMP_DETAIL WHERE REPORT_ID = #{REPORT_ID}

SELECT CREDIT_ORG ORG_NAME, CURRENCY CURRENCY, LACK_INTE_BALANCE AMOUNT, BALANCE_CHANGE_DATE BALANCE_CHANGE_DATE, LACK_INTE_TYPE OI_TYPE, SETTLE_STATUS STATUS FROM COM_LACK_INTEREST REPORT_ID = #{REPORT_ID} UNION ALL SELECT CREDIT_ORG ORG_NAME, CURRENCY CURRENCY, HIS_MAX_LACK_INTE AMOUNT, LAST_SETTLE_DATE BALANCE_CHANGE_DATE, LACK_INTE_TYPE OI_TYPE, SETTLE_STATUS STATUS FROM COM_LACK_INTEREST WHERE SETTLE_STATUS = '1' AND REPORT_ID = #{REPORT_ID}
